City of Stanton Holidays

City of Stanton Holidays

Holidays are: New Years Day, Martin Luther King Day, Presidents Day, Good Friday, Memorial Day, Juneteenth, Independence Day, Labor Day, Veterans Day, Thanksgiving (day of and the day after), Christmas Eve, Christmas Day.

The City also observes early release/late start/school closure for bad weather days.

Contact Information

  • City of Stanton
    P O Box 370, Stanton
    TX 79782-0370
  • Main Number:
    432-756-3301
  • Water Department:
    432-756-3302
  • Police Department:
    432-756-3303
  • For after-hour calls or emergencies, call the Martin County Sheriff Office
    (432-756-3336)     to get in touch with the City personnel who are on-call.
  • cityofstantontx@gmail.com
  • The City of Stanton Attorney
    Paige Skehan
    Ms. Skehan can be contacted at P O Box 81, Rankin, Texas, 79778
  • Our offices are open from
    Monday - Friday
    8:00 am to 5:00 pm
    The offices are closed on most holidays.
